<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine source-relative inrange.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a> SrcInRange = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/micromipssizereduction-cpp/#aaac99696c5f396905a86fa853f41614f">InRange</a>-&gt;sextOrTrunc(IndexWidth).add(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that the GEP offset is in the range (treating upper bound as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inclusive here).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aaca3a4d2b25c24b11179cbd01079b73c">contains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &amp;&amp; SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aa1955c426e1ff66455b4bb6657ee995d">getUpper</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find which struct member the range corresponds to.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a23f4339e49343721146062b10c144052">getLower</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af4b1ccc0b78f9da9f3f3944e06007f1d">uge</a>(SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a0b6603d0838e3b40bf5c0a403c0510f2">getSizeInBytes</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MemberIndex =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">        SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a331caeb70809f50e71528de06fba7b66">getElementContainingOffset</a>(SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a23f4339e49343721146062b10c144052">getLower</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a217e0207d9cc8e046c2dccbf0e4bb198">getZExtValue</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> MemberStart = MemberOffsets&#91;MemberIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> MemberEnd = MemberIndex == MemberOffsets.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() - 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">                             ? SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a0b6603d0838e3b40bf5c0a403c0510f2">getSizeInBytes</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">                             : MemberOffsets&#91;MemberIndex + 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify that the range matches that struct member.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a23f4339e49343721146062b10c144052">getLower</a>() != MemberStart ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">        SrcInRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aa1955c426e1ff66455b4bb6657ee995d">getUpper</a>() != MemberEnd)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    SplitGlobals&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = SplitGV;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SplitBegin = SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a3932cc53acb297750961bfdaa86425bc">getElementOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">                            ? SL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/structlayout/#a0b6603d0838e3b40bf5c0a403c0510f2">getSizeInBytes</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Rebuild type metadata, adjusting by the split offset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: See if we can use DW&#95;OP&#95;piece to preserve debug metadata here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> : Types) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t ByteOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantAsMetadata&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>-&gt;getOperand(0))-&gt;getValue())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">              -&gt;getZExtValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Type metadata may be attached one byte after the end of the vtable, for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// classes without virtual methods in Itanium ABI. AFAIK, it is never</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// attached to the first byte of a vtable. Subtract one to get the right</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// slice.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is making an assumption that vtable groups are the only kinds of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// global variables that !type metadata can be attached to, and that they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are either Itanium ABI vtable groups or contain a single vtable (i.e.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Microsoft ABI vtables).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t AttachedTo = (ByteOffset == 0) ? ByteOffset : ByteOffset - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AttachedTo &lt; SplitBegin || AttachedTo &gt;= SplitEnd)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      SplitGV-&gt;addMetadata(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">          LLVMContext::MD&#95;type,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode/#a7d10a7b9b7f40b04d27ed97c38ea1950">MDNode::get</a>(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">                       &#123;ConstantAsMetadata::get(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">                            ConstantInt::get(Int32Ty, ByteOffset - SplitBegin)),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">                        Type-&gt;getOperand(1)&#125;));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#a1f496e54accb2cbe919fb456cb703f1a">hasMetadata</a>(LLVMContext::MD&#95;vcall&#95;visibility))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      SplitGV-&gt;setVCallVisibilityMetadata(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#a8eed548b25235cac65c22832aeb628fc">getVCallVisibility</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GEPInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a> : Infos) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.MemberIndex &lt; SplitGlobals.size() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid member&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;NewGEP = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantexpr/#ae4d4490a35a575d97166684fb15f8662">ConstantExpr::getGetElementPtr</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7ba5de75f50bb4a4ba920698edf39b28">Type::getInt8Ty</a>(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>()), SplitGlobals&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.MemberIndex&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.GEP-&gt;isInBounds());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.GEP-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(NewGEP);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finally, remove the original global. Any remaining uses refer to invalid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elements of the global, so replace with poison.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a9d7de807ebdfe1819df3ff6cb0f16158">use&#95;empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3ab5fc45117b450e8bb04e564cb6e5f2">replaceAllUsesWith</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/poisonvalue/#a1bf08613fb664a2e377a9a72c59a6b66">PoisonValue::get</a>(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a913a5d4b2cddde762446bd494e81a3f2">getType</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#ae0cf03d5de37330b1eb69dd22a1d5057">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="#a93898976321fdcdb6827b4885b0d435c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a93898976321fdcdb6827b4885b0d435c">splitGlobals</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, see if the module uses either of the llvm.type.test or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// llvm.type.checked.load intrinsics, which indicates that splitting globals</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may be beneficial.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;TypeTestFunc =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#aa1731508126b77035ab3ba9d71d5374b">Intrinsic::getDeclarationIfExists</a>(&amp;M, Intrinsic::type&#95;test);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;TypeCheckedLoadFunc =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#aa1731508126b77035ab3ba9d71d5374b">Intrinsic::getDeclarationIfExists</a>(&amp;M, Intrinsic::type&#95;checked&#95;load);</Highlight></CodeLine>
